name: startholdem
summary: Starts a holdem game in the channel.

name: joinholdem
summary: Adds your user id to the list of players at the holdem table.

name: startround
summary: Once the players are all gathered, starts the holdem round.

name: holdemtable
summary: Lists the players at the table.

name: holdemchips
summary: Shows the amount of chips you have.

name: holdempot
summary: How many chips are in the pot right now.

name: holdembet
summary: Starts the betting

name: holdemcheck
summary: Advances betting without betting chips. Can only be used at the start of a round or after a check.

name: holdemcall
summary: Calls the last bet made.

name: holdemraise
summary: Raises the previous bet by the amount indicated.

name: holdemallin
summary: For the truly brave.

name: holdemfold
summary: For lily-livered pole-cats.

name: holdemleave
summary: Indicate to the bot that you cant take it anymore.

name: sendfactionblast
summary: Sends a message to every member of a faction that the bot can see.

name: getfactioncount
summary: Gets the realtime count of all members of a faction from the SWNBot API.

name: monthlychanges
summary: A command that runs both the cleanfaclists command and the addtorightfaction commands one after the other

name: addtorightfaction
summary: Adds a user to the faction they are a part of in the main server.

name: cleanfaclists
summary: Can be run either against everyone on a server or against a specific user (at the user as a parameter to use the latter). Will check and make sure the faction roles match with the main FV server.

name: cleanfaclists
summary: Can be run either against everyone on a server or against a specific user (at the user as a parameter to use the latter). Will check and make sure the faction roles match with the main FV server.

name: listfaction
summary: Returns the list of all factions available to the addfaction command.

name: addfaction
summary: Adds the sender to the selected faction. Administrators can at an individual then specify the faction and the bot will add the user to the faction. This is the preferred way to add, since the bot with check with the FV server to make sure that the user is a part of that faction.

name: addfaction
summary: Adds a user to the selected faction.

name: removefaction
summary: Exactly like the addfaction command, but removes. Has the same at user overload.

name: removefaction
summary: Exactly like the addfaction command, but removes. Has the same at user overload.

name: removeentirefaction
summary: Kicks and entire faction from the server

name: tracker
summary: Pastes the link to the faction tracker in chat.

name: rulings
summary: Pastes the link to the rulings doc in chat.

name: archivechannel
summary: Dumps a json log of the channel into chat.

name: playbingo
summary: Starts the bingo game.

name: playwinner
summary: Indicates to the bot that you have BINGO.

name: iwanttoplay
summary: Indicates to the bot that you wish to play in the bingo game.

name: postmeeting
summary: Posts a meeting in the right channel indicating the date time and agenda.

name: acknowledge
summary: For representatives, indicates that your faction knows that the meeting was called.

name: attend
summary: Indicates that your faction will attend the meeting.

name: timetill
summary: Calculates the time til a meeting in hours.

name: addrepresentative
summary: Adds a user as the representative of a faction.

name: addrepresentative
summary: Adds a user as the representative of a faction.

name: removerepresentative
summary: Removes a user as a faction representative.

name: removerepresentative
summary: Removes a user as a faction representative.

name: propose
summary: Propose a topic for a meeting to the other representatives.

name: setcolors
summary: Initializes the factions with their correct, official colors.

name: setbotusername
summary: Makes the bot all fancy

name: ping
summary: Test whether or no the bot is awake.

name: commands
summary: Pastes a link to the help page in the chat.

name: addspeaker
summary: Adds the user as a speaker for meeting purposes.

name: changedefaults
summary: Changes the default speaking time, if needed.

name: starttimer
summary: Starts the timer against a user.

name: clearspeakers
summary: Resets the speaker list.

name: clearchannel
summary: Clears the channel of chat messages.

name: clearchannel
summary: Clears the channel of chat messages.

name: cactus
summary: You should use this wherever possible.

name: virtues
summary: Ten Blessings yall.

name: churchapproved
summary: The only way to express approval.

name: savior
summary: Answers that age-old question.

name: opensource
summary: Pastes a link to the github repo in the chat.

name: vote
summary: Handles multifation voting.

name: tally
summary: Tallies the votes.

name: deletequestion
summary: Removes a question from the database.

name: synth
summary: Determines whether or not someone is a synth.

name: tag
summary: Searches for a tag and displays the summary in chat.

name: asset
summary: Search for an asset and display it in chat.

name: badbot
summary: At this point, I'm pretty sure the bot likes it.

name: roll
summary: Rolls some dice.

name: sector
summary: Pastes the link to the sectorswithoutnumber page in chat.

name: trilljoke
summary: Nuff said.

name: xkcd
summary: Random web comic anyone?

name: xkcd
summary: Random web comic anyone?

name: dumpcommands
summary: Updates the command help page.
